sentences.en: A whale is a kind of mammal.
sentences.cn: 鲸是一种哺乳动物.

sentences.en: A whale is no less a mammal than a horse is.
sentences.cn: 鲸鱼和马一样都是哺乳动物.

sentences.en: Animal rights activists oppose using any mammal as an organ factory.
sentences.cn: 动物权力保护分子反对用任何哺乳动物作为器官工厂.

sentences.en: Elephants have a longer pregnancy than any other mammal — almost 22 months.
sentences.cn: 大象孕期比任何其它哺乳动物都长-大概22个月.

sentences.en: However, this fur - covered mammal lays eggs from which the babies are hatched!
sentences.cn: 但是, 这种全身毛皮的哺乳动物却是通过产卵孵出小鸭嘴兽的.

sentences.en: Humans, dogs, elephants, and dolphins are all mammals, but birds, fish, and crocodiles are not.
sentences.cn: 人、狗、大象和海豚都是哺乳动物，而鸟、鱼和鳄鱼则不是。

sentences.en: In comparison with the mammal, the ordinary reptile is altogether reckless of its offspring.
sentences.cn: 和哺乳动物比起来, 一般的爬行动物对它们的后代简直是太漠不关心了.

sentences.en: It is very unusual for a mammal to lay eggs or to have poisonous spurs!
sentences.cn: 对哺乳动物来说,卵生和长有毒刺是很少见的.

sentences.en: Its hairy body suggests a mammal.
sentences.cn: 它毛茸茸的身体表明它是哺乳动物。

sentences.en: She also refurbished the dry land mammal running most quickly speed record.
sentences.cn: 同时她也刷新了陆地哺乳动物最快奔跑速度.

sentences.en: Sika deer ( cervus nippon ), subordinated toartiodactyla, cervidae , muntiacus, is a kind of ruminated mammal.
sentences.cn: 梅花鹿 ( Cervusnippon ) 隶属偶蹄目 、 鹿科 、 鹿属, 是反刍哺乳动物.

sentences.en: The function of a mammal's fur is to insulate the body.
sentences.cn: 哺乳动物皮毛的功能在于使身体保温.

sentences.en: The more you follow the fear, the more you live like a lower mammal.
sentences.cn: 你越是追随恐惧行为，就越会活得像个低级哺乳动物。

sentences.en: The problem with that theory is that no other mammal has resorted to this method of cooling down.
sentences.cn: 这一理论的问题在于，没有其他的哺乳动物采取了这种降低体温的方式。

sentences.en: The spiny anteater, an egg-laying mammal native to Australia and New Guinea, has a penis with four heads, but only two fit into the female at once.
sentences.cn: 针鼹是一种仅产于澳大利亚和新几内亚的卵生哺乳动物。 它有一个四个头的阴茎，不过一次只把两个放入雌性体内。

sentences.en: The whale is a mammal.
sentences.cn: 鲸鱼是哺乳动物。

sentences.en: The whale is the largest mammal in all creation.
sentences.cn: 鲸是全世界最大的哺乳动物.

sentences.en: The whale is the largest mammal in creation.
sentences.cn: 鲸鱼是所有哺乳动物中最大的.

sentences.en: There is a close analogy between the gills of a fish and the lungs of a mammal.
sentences.cn: 鱼的鳃与哺乳动物的肺很相似.

sentences.en: Today is the birthday of Dolly the sheep. She was the first mammal to be successfully cloned from an adult sheep cell.
sentences.cn: 今天是桃莉羊的诞生日，她是第一只由成年绵羊细胞所成功复制出来的哺乳动物。

sentences.en: Whale is not a fish; it is a mammal.
sentences.cn: 鲸不是鱼类, 它是一种哺乳动物.

trans.tran_en: a type of animal that drinks milk from its mother’s body when it is young. Humans, dogs, and whales are mammals.
